metadata.name: HackTool - CACTUSTORCH Remote Thread Creation
metadata.comment: Detects remote thread creation from CACTUSTORCH as described in references.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('4') AND (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\system32\\cscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\system32\\wscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\system32\\mshta.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\winword.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\excel.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('\\syswow64\\')) AND module.start_address is null)

output.summary: Detects remote thread creation from CACTUSTORCH as described in references.
